hook.text: UN: Iran water crisis? Thoughts and prayers. Meeting adjourned!

segments.text: Maryam: United Nations holds emergency meeting about Iran water crisis.
Cut to UN assembly. Stewie as UN Secretary: We have decided to send thoughts and prayers.
Cleveland-style diplomat: That is nasty. Anyway, is it time for lunch?
Cut back to Maryam. Her hijab slowly slides off from frustration.
Maryam: In other news, fish in dried Urmia Lake have started an evolution speedrun.
Maryam: They are evolving to grow tiny legs now.
Show cartoon fish with tiny legs. Persian text appears: 'Running fish'.

cta.text: Share this message - every voice matters!

full_text: UN: Iran water crisis? Thoughts and prayers. Meeting adjourned! Maryam: United Nations holds emergency meeting about Iran water crisis. Cut to UN assembly. Stewie as UN Secretary: We have decided to send thoughts and prayers. Stewie: Meeting adjourned! Cleveland-style diplomat: That is nasty. Anyway, is it time for lunch? Cut back to Maryam. Her hijab slowly slides off from frustration. Maryam: In other news, fish in dried Urmia Lake have started an evolution speedrun. Maryam: They are evolving to grow tiny legs now. Show cartoon fish with tiny legs. Persian text appears: 'Running fish'. Share this message - every voice matters!
